short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rid the internet of eye-popping colors and transform it into a drab world of sprawling grays.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The internet is full of things engineered to grab your attention. Make the internet boring again! Ban colors!

Kind of inspired by http://lifehacker.com/change-your-screen-to-grayscale-to-combat-phone-addicti-1795821843.
